mapper.select:
SELECT CLUE_ID,ROAMING,OPERATOR,PHONE,CASE_UNIT,CASE_NO,CASE_CATEGORY,MONEY,TIME, CASE_BRIEF,VICTIM_PHONE,OWNER,OWNER_ID,OWNER_ADDRESS,STATE,DATE(ISSUE_TIME) AS ISSUE_TIME,LIAISON_OFFICER,JURISDICTION,MATERIAL, ATTRIBUTION,SITUATION,SUSPECT,SUSPECT_NUM,JZ_PERSON,DATE(JZ_INQUIRY_TIME) AS JZ_INQUIRY_TIME,FZ_PERSON,REMARK,CLUE_TIME FROM BT_CLUE
AND CLUE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{clueId}, '%')
AND ROAMING LIKE CONCAT('%', #{roaming}, '%')
AND OPERATOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{operator}, '%')
AND PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
AND CASE_UNIT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{caseUnit}, '%')
AND CASE_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{caseNo}, '%')
AND CASE_CATEGORY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{caseCategory}, '%')
AND MONEY = #{money}
AND TIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{time}, '%')
AND CASE_BRIEF LIKE CONCAT('%', #{caseBrief}, '%')
AND VICTIM_PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{victimPhone}, '%')
AND OWNER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{owner}, '%')
AND OWNER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ownerId}, '%')
AND OWNER_ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ownerAddress}, '%')
AND STATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{state}, '%')
AND ISSUE_TIME = #{issueTime}
AND LIAISON_OFFICER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{liaisonOfficer}, '%')
AND JURISDICTION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{jurisdiction}, '%')
AND MATERIAL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{material}, '%')
AND ATTRIBUTION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{attribution}, '%')
AND SITUATION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{situation}, '%')
AND SUSPECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{suspect}, '%')
AND SUSPECT_NUM = #{suspectNum}
AND JZ_PERSON LIKE CONCAT('%', #{jzPerson}, '%')
AND JZ_INQUIRY_TIME = #{jzInquiryTime}
AND FZ_PERSON LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fzPerson}, '%')
AND REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{remark}, '%')
order by CLUE_ID desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bt_clue ( CLUE_ID, ROAMING, OPERATOR, PHONE, CASE_UNIT, CASE_NO, CASE_CATEGORY, MONEY, TIME, CASE_BRIEF, VICTIM_PHONE, OWNER, OWNER_ID,OWNER_ADDRESS, STATE, ISSUE_TIME, LIAISON_OFFICER, JURISDICTION, MATERIAL, ATTRIBUTION, SITUATION, SUSPECT, SUSPECT_NUM, JZ_PERSON, JZ_INQUIRY_TIME, FZ_PERSON, REMARK,CLUE_TIME) VALUES ( #{clueId}, #{roaming}, #{operator}, #{phone}, #{caseUnit}, #{caseNo}, #{caseCategory}, #{money}, #{time}, #{caseBrief}, #{victimPhone}, #{owner}, #{ownerId}, #{ownerAddress},#{state}, #{issueTime}, #{liaisonOfficer}, #{jurisdiction}, #{material}, #{attribution}, #{situation}, #{suspect}, #{suspectNum}, #{jzPerson}, #{jzInquiryTime}, #{fzPerson}, #{remark}, #{clueTime})

INSERT IGNORE bt_clue ( CLUE_ID, ROAMING, OPERATOR, PHONE, CASE_UNIT, CASE_NO, CASE_CATEGORY, MONEY, TIME, CASE_BRIEF, VICTIM_PHONE, OWNER, OWNER_ID,OWNER_ADDRESS, STATE, ISSUE_TIME, LIAISON_OFFICER, JURISDICTION, MATERIAL, ATTRIBUTION, SITUATION, SUSPECT, SUSPECT_NUM, JZ_PERSON, JZ_INQUIRY_TIME, FZ_PERSON, REMARK,CLUE_TIME) VALUES
( #{item.clueId}, #{item.roaming}, #{item.operator}, #{item.phone}, #{item.caseUnit}, #{item.caseNo}, #{item.caseCategory}, #{item.money}, #{item.time}, #{item.caseBrief}, #{item.victimPhone}, #{item.owner}, #{item.ownerId}, #{item.ownerAddress},#{item.state}, #{item.issueTime}, #{item.liaisonOfficer}, #{item.jurisdiction}, #{item.material}, #{item.attribution}, #{item.situation}, #{item.suspect}, #{item.suspectNum}, #{item.jzPerson}, #{item.jzInquiryTime}, #{item.fzPerson}, #{item.remark}, #{clueTime})

INSERT IGNORE bt_clue ( CLUE_ID, ROAMING, OPERATOR, PHONE, CASE_UNIT, CASE_NO, CASE_CATEGORY, MONEY, TIME, CASE_BRIEF, VICTIM_PHONE, OWNER, OWNER_ID,OWNER_ADDRESS, STATE, ISSUE_TIME, LIAISON_OFFICER, JURISDICTION, MATERIAL, ATTRIBUTION, SITUATION, SUSPECT, SUSPECT_NUM, JZ_PERSON, JZ_INQUIRY_TIME, FZ_PERSON, REMARK,CLUE_TIME) VALUES
( #{item.clueId}, #{item.roaming}, #{item.operator}, #{item.phone}, #{item.caseUnit}, #{item.caseNo}, #{item.caseCategory}, #{item.money}, #{item.time}, #{item.caseBrief}, #{item.victimPhone}, #{item.owner}, #{item.ownerId}, #{item.ownerAddress},#{item.state}, #{item.issueTime}, #{item.liaisonOfficer}, #{item.jurisdiction}, #{item.material}, #{item.attribution}, #{item.situation}, #{item.suspect}, #{item.suspectNum}, #{item.jzPerson}, #{item.jzInquiryTime}, #{item.fzPerson}, #{item.remark}, #{item.clueTime})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ROAMING = VALUES(ROAMING), OPERATOR = VALUES(OPERATOR), PHONE = VALUES(PHONE), CASE_UNIT = VALUES(CASE_UNIT), CASE_NO = VALUES(CASE_NO), CASE_CATEGORY = VALUES(CASE_CATEGORY), MONEY = VALUES(MONEY), TIME = VALUES(TIME), CASE_BRIEF = VALUES(CASE_BRIEF), VICTIM_PHONE = VALUES(VICTIM_PHONE), OWNER = VALUES(OWNER), OWNER_ID = VALUES(OWNER_ID), OWNER_ADDRESS = VALUES(OWNER_ADDRESS), STATE = VALUES(STATE), ISSUE_TIME = VALUES(ISSUE_TIME), LIAISON_OFFICER = VALUES(LIAISON_OFFICER), JURISDICTION = VALUES(JURISDICTION), MATERIAL = VALUES(MATERIAL), ATTRIBUTION = VALUES(ATTRIBUTION), SITUATION = VALUES(SITUATION), SUSPECT = VALUES(SUSPECT), SUSPECT_NUM = VALUES(SUSPECT_NUM), JZ_PERSON = VALUES(JZ_PERSON), JZ_INQUIRY_TIME = VALUES(JZ_INQUIRY_TIME), FZ_PERSON = VALUES(FZ_PERSON), REMARK = VALUES(REMARK), CLUE_TIME = VALUES(CLUE_TIME)
mapper.select: SELECT CLUE_ID FROM BT_CLUE ORDER BY CLUE_ID DESC LIMIT 1
